searchQuery: Biblical Prophecy and End Times News

results.title: Pastor Jack Hibbs, Amir Tsarfati Link Oct. 7 Attacks To Bible Prophecy
results.summary: Pastor Jack Hibbs and Amir Tsarfati connect the Oct. 7 attacks on Israel to Bible prophecy, citing Old Testament prophets like Joel, Ezekiel, and Isaiah. They view the attacks as a pivotal moment in God’s divine timeline, emphasizing Israel’s role in the End Times. Tsarfati dismisses allegations of genocide against Palestinians and highlights prophecies about the restoration of Israel and judgment on those who oppose it, warning against antisemitism as "demonic." Remember to view the original source with spiritual discernment.

title: Pastor Jack Hibbs, Amir Tsarfati Link Oct. 7 Attacks To Bible Prophecy
